PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07592015-06-04HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations and the Marihuana for Medical Purposes Regulations (Communication of Information)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS AND THE MARIHUANA FOR MEDICAL PURPOSES REGULATIONS (COMMUNICATION OF INFORMATION) in order to (1) enhance the role of healthcare practitioners by requiring licensed producers to share transactional information with their healthcare licensing authorities; and (2) enable Health Canada to proactively share healthcare practitioner information.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0132 Publication Date: 2015-06-17
AttachmentsAttachment
